As an AI language model, I can not make a personal recommendation based on your needs, interests, and preferences. However, I can provide some general guidance that may help you decide which service is best for you based on factors like game selection, device compatibility, and overall ease of use.

If you're a casual gamer who doesn't need access to a wide selection of games, either the free plan for Google Stadia or the free plan for GeForce Now may be a good choice. Both services offer the ability to purchase individual games, and both offer limited access to free games.

If you're primarily interested in playing games on your mobile device, Google Stadia may be the better option, as it's compatible with a wide range of Android devices. However, if you primarily use a PC, a Mac, or a Nvidia Shield device, GeForce Now may be the better option.

It's also a good idea to read reviews and watch videos from other users to get a better sense of which service might be best for you. Ultimately, the service that's best for you will depend on your personal needs, preferences, and budget.
